Body: My question is to try to find the origin of the word kokkova. I have an antique/primitive pin made of ivory which if I had to guess would say that it is walrus but not 100% sure. It is scrimshawed with a basic line design and the word Kokkova. (it is possible that the "v" is an "r") I thought it could be an inuit piece but again unable to say definitively. Thanks, Devo
Title: Kokkova or kokkora carved on ivory
